LanguageData.RR_EquivalentResearchBench_desc: This kit provives portable versions of the tools avaiable at this type of research bench.
LanguageData.RR_EquivalentResearchFacilities_desc: This kit provives portable versions of these research facilities.
LanguageData.RR_RemoteConnectionFacility_desc: Establishes connection to research benches (and their networked facilities) through this facility.
LanguageData.RR_UplinkResearchSpeedFactor_desc: Research speed multiplier provided by remote connection to the research facility.
